title: What would happen if all of a sudden Google stops working for a month? - Quora

response.answer_text: Lets go to imagination world ok Imagine you are going to another country or state you are walking on road you are new in the area so you open Google Maps for insistence but you see it is not working so now you can say that you are lost. 2 Someone wants to send information but if Gmail stopped then they cannot send the information. I know there are alternatives but Gmail is mostly used by world wide. 3 Google Adsense - If this service stopped then 45% of websites will go down because it is the only way to get revenue for some websites. 4- Google Search engine - If this goes down then you know what will happen. We cannot search anything on Internet alternatives are available but it is used commonly everywhere 5 Google Cloud- Not just about Google drive but Google cloud services are used by Many Companies like snapchat, HTC, Cocacola, Dominos, Spotify etc. If Google cloud goes down then your data for these companies will go down. At last we can say that we are not using Google Google is using Us

All the remaining search engines are flooded with queries like “what happened to Google”.Facebook,Twitter and quora trends Googlestopedworking. Innumerous videos explaining what's wrong with Google are uploaded to youtube. libraries will have visitors atlast,encyclopedia printers will make fortunes and shares of search engines like Yahoo and Bing would touch skies.
